channel.title: How to make admin zone with commands
channel.description: i need a admin zone with command to get there like ::staffzone please someone help

item.title: How to make admin zone with commands
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

then it will look something like:

if (command.startsWith("staffzone") && playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = XXXX; //replace XXXX with the x coords of your staffzone teleportToY = YYYY; //replace YYYY with the Y coords of your staffzone sendMessage("Welcome to the staff zone"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make admin zone with commands

item.title: How to make admin zone with commands
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

add a command that teleports you to the coords that you want to be the staffzone. Add the command in the client.java under customCommands[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2009, 09:49:10 pm[/size][hr]What source are you using?

Read full topic
